summary:
Organised, curious and open-minded, I have four years' experience in various areas of communication and marketing: influence, press relations, brand partnerships, events, content creation, etc.
With a Master's degree in International Tourism Management, I'm passionate about the world of travel and want to help others open up to the world and create precious memories.
